text: Jahir a variant of Jair is a given name. It may refer to: ==People== ===Given name=== *Jahir Barraza (born 1990), Mexican footballer *Jahir Khan, Fijian senior police officer of Indian descent *Jahir Ocampo (born 1990), Mexican diver *Jahir Butrón (born 1975), Peruvian footballer ===Surname=== *Shahidul Jahir (1953–2008), Bangladeshi novelist and short story writer ==See also== *Jair (name)
title: Jahir
